text: Ra allahako smarana gara, gananaka dinaharuma (tina dina). Yadi kasaile chito gardacha (ra) du'i (eghara, bahra) dinamai hind'ihalcha bhane tyasala'i kunai gunaha (papa) chaina. Ra jo pachi (tehra tarikhasam'ma) basirahanchan, tinimathi pani kunai gunaha chaina, yi tyo manisako lagi hun jo parahejagara hos. Allahasita dardai gara, ra janirakha timiharu usaiche'u jam'ma garine chau
